refInsert: Automatically inserts the reference ID into the Nexvia links while typing the description.
uiCleaner: Enables the UI cleaner to hide unused or distracting elements from the interface.
photoResizer: Applies a consistent 3:2 aspect ratio to photos and improves resizing UX.
fullWidth: Ensures the description field is shown in full width for easier editing.
listingHelper: Import a code, and get all the listing creation info straight from Easy, with ultra practical copy/paste capabilities.
